intro: Psidium pirayuense, commonly known as the Pirayuense guava, is a small evergreen tree native to the Atlantic Forest region of Brazil. It belongs to the Myrtaceae family and is characterized by its glossy,椭圆形 (elliptical) leaves and fragrant white flowers.
